text: Sergiño Gianni Dest (born November 3, 2000) is a professional soccer player who plays for PSV Eindhoven, on loan from La Liga club FC Barcelona. Born in the Netherlands to a Dutch mother and Surinamese-American father, Dest has represented the United States internationally at senior level since 2019. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League National cup Continental Other Total Division Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Jong Ajax Eerste Divisie 17 1 — — — 17 1 2019–20 Eerste Divisie 1 0 — — — 1 0 Total 18 1 — — — 18 1 Ajax 2019–20 Eredivisie 20 0 4 2 10 0 1 0 35 2 2020–21 Eredivisie 3 0 — — — 3 0 Total 23 0 4 2 10 0 1 0 38 2 Barcelona 2020–21 La Liga 30 2 3 0 7 1 1 0 41 3 2021–22 La Liga 21 0 1 0 9 0 0 0 31 0 Total 51 2 4 0 16 1 1 0 72 3 AC Milan (loan) 2022–23 Serie A 8 0 1 0 4 0 1 0 14 0 PSV (loan) 2023–24 Eredivisie 7 0 0 0 6 0 — 13 0 Career total 107 3 9 2 36 1 3 0 155 6 ===International=== Appearances and goals by national team and year National team Year Apps Goals United States 2019 3 0 2020 2 0 2021 10 2 2022 8 0 2023 7 0 Total 30 2 :Scores and results list United States' goal tally first, score column indicates score after each Dest goal.
